means: 使烦恼，使意气消沉，使气馁，使无精神

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"压迫，镇压"之意。
means: oppress ： 指用武力或权力等压迫、压制别人。
suppress ： 通常指通过强力，迅速有力地制止某事，或用意志控制自己的感情。

sentence.Network_en: He states uncompromisingly that he is opposed to any practices which oppress animals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坚决声明反对任何虐待动物的行为。

sentence.Network_en: The imperialists exploit and oppress all the peoples of the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 帝国主义者剥削和压迫全世界人民.

sentence.Network_en: A good ruler will not oppress the poor.
sentence.Network_cn: 好的统治者不会压迫贫民.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... impressive a 给人深刻印象的 oppress v 压迫，虐待 oppression n 压迫；苦难.
英语单词常见前缀后缀_百度文库 ... impressive 留给人印象深刻的 oppress 压抑 (对…施加压力) repress 抑制 (压迫回来).
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... oppose 反对 oppress 压迫，压制，压抑 optimism 乐观，乐观主义.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... oppose 反对，反抗 oppress 压迫，压制；压抑 opt 挑选，选择.

list.abs: 讠 - 英汉词典 ... 鳖甲/ turtle shell/ 憋闷/ feel oppressed/be depressed/be dejected/ 鳖裙/ calipash/.
opposite phyllotaxis 对生叶序oppressed tree 被压树oppression 压迫
offenders暴行 oppressive conduct殴打某人 physically assault sb/beat up someb.
路过看看[旺旺英语论坛] ... the wounded 伤员 the oppressed 被压迫者 the privileged 特权阶级.
GRAMMAR TUTORSHIP ... the blind 盲人； the oppressed 受压迫者 The Lius have moved to Guangzhou. 刘家搬到广州市去了。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French oppresser, from medieval Latin oppressare, from Latin oppress- 'pressed against', from the verb opprimere

entry.def: To oppress people means to treat them cruelly, or to prevent them from having the same opportunities, freedom, and benefits as others.

example.ex: These people often are oppressed by the governments of the countries they find themselves in...
example.tran: 这些人经常受到所在国政府的压迫。

example.ex: We are not normal like everybody else. If we were they wouldn't be oppressing us.
example.tran: 我们跟其他正常人不一样。否则，他们就不会压迫我们了。

entry.tran: 使心情沉重；使压抑；使苦恼
entry.def: If something oppresses you, it makes you feel depressed, anxious, and uncomfortable.

example.ex: The place oppressed Aubrey even before his eyes adjusted to the dark...
example.tran: 奥布里的眼睛还没有适应黑暗之前，这地方便已经让他觉得很压抑了。

example.ex: It was not just the weather which oppressed her.
example.tran: 让她心烦的不只是天气。

means.word_mean: 1. come down on or keep down by unjust use of one's authority;

sentences.sentence: "Jews were persecuted in the former Soviet Union"

auth_sentence.content: Until the poppied warmth of sleep oppress'd Her soothed limbs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Until the poppied warmth of sleep oppress'd Her soothed limbs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Until the poppied warmth of sleep oppress'd Her soothed limbs.

auth_sentence.content: It does not mean freedom to oppress in the name of religion.
auth_sentence.res_content: It does not mean freedom to oppress in the name of religion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It does not mean freedom to oppress in the name of religion.

auth_sentence.content: Obama said modern technology should be used to empower people, not oppress them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Obama said modern technology should be used to empower people, not oppress them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Obama said modern technology should be used to empower people, not oppress them.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

sentences.cn: 种种困难使我父亲意志消沉。

sentences.en: She is often oppressed by him.

jushi.english: She was oppressed by her many woes.
jushi.chinese: 她的许多烦恼使她受到压抑。
我父亲因各种困扰而意志消沉。
不美满的婚姻使他如同背上沉重的包袱。
